fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to sting a player, disabling their ability for one day and one night.
- Use 2 bees to investigate a player, learning their role and who they visit.
- Use 3 bees to deal a Powerful attack to a player. Visitors to that player will be stung (see first ability).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will earn 1 bee every night. You may use up to two bee abilities each night.
- All Unseen (or Beekeeper if present) players have your other abilities and attributes in addition to their own.
- All other players will think they have the abilities and attributes of (1175) Beekeeper Hivemind. However, the ability will fail in some way if attempted to use.
